AidingMeasurementVelocity
public
AidingMeasurementInput
AidingMeasurementVelocity

A class that represents velocity aiding measurement inputs. Extends AidingMeasurementInput.

ValidFlags

Bitmask for each velocity value in the valid flags.

X

0x01

Y

0x02

Z

0x04

NORTH

0x01

EAST

0x02

DOWN

0x04
